author: epugh
msg: Refactored the packaging.  Now there is a a model/ directory where the model lives,
and a spi/ where the various service providers live.  I think this will allow better
mixing and matching of models and implementors.  Also makes the names clearer.

author: epugh
msg: make tasks show up since the tasks plugin is choking on a vdoclet error

author: epugh
msg: First cut at repackaged Secruity component.  Added a InMemory version that only
keeps security in ram.  Full unit tests.  Also added an "adapter" to use the in memory
secuirty within Turbine as an example and test of integration..
